content: There are many tourist attractions such as Goblin filming location, Jumunjin, Gyeongpo Beach, and there were a lot of delicious food.
Gangneung is so good to travel! There are a lot of food, there is the sea, and there are many places to visit :-)

Duro Prospecting Station is located in the northernmost part of the military cordon. Looking northward or through telescopes, the indoor model can see the scenery of North Korea. There are 500 viewing seats, as well as VIP rooms, condition rooms, parking lots and other ancillary facilities.

Our self-financed tourists and two other tour groups (one of them is European and American tourists) take buses for the scenic spot to enter the "non-military personnel restricted area" within a short distance. After checking the number of people boarded by the Korean gendarmerie armed with guns and bullets, the car traveled across the highway bridge on the Linjin River to the third tunnel. Leaving the third tunnel, we took a bus to Duro Prospecting Station. When we got off the bus, we saw the words "the end of the split, the starting point of the unification" painted in fascinating colors on the tall building. This is the closest place to the 38th Line in South Korea. There are more than a dozen high-powered telescopes in front of the Taipei Wall near the high platform. You can see the scenery of North Korea in the opposite direction with 500 won (equivalent to RMB 3 yuan). Unfortunately, Heaven is not beautiful. It is impossible to see the opposite scenery in the dark clouds. Maybe Heaven is unwilling to let us witness the tragedy of national division. There is a clear yellow warning line sign on the viewing platform. Tourists can only take pictures within the Yellow line. Because of the weather conditions on that day, there are basically no violations by tourists. Under the eaves of the viewing terrace hangs a huge landscape photograph, which clearly shows the location of Kaicheng, Sichuan River and the bronze statue of Kim Il Sung opposite Korea under a clear sky. We can only comfort ourselves by photographs, after all, standing in the northernmost part of Korea. There is a double-decked Pavilion near Duro Prospect Terrace. On the second floor, there is a big bell praying for peace. On the first floor, there is a small and exquisite Forward Peace Temple. In the empty courtyard outside the temple, there is a statue of Maitreya Buddha. There are also information films and TV circular broadcasting, because it is to introduce the Korean army's mighty and heroic content, so we did not go to join the fun.

You can see the Korean side, Kaesong Industrial Park, two villages in DMZ, and their flagpole (Haha). Telescopes can be used for 500 Korean coins. You can't take pictures at the outlook, you can only take pictures behind a yellow line before you reach the outlook, so everybody's pictures are from this angle.

The observation deck is mainly to see North Korea from the shortest distance, but only the distance, except for a large open area, there is nothing to see. Personally, I think the JSA close contact in Panmunjom is more exciting.

The area of the observation deck is not large, the viewing area here is very rich, many scenery are more fun, it is good to enjoy the natural scenery here, the tour bus stops to ask tourists to enjoy the scenery and take pictures.
In the middle of the cable car, you can see some scenery, but if you want to use the equipment to watch, you have to buy tickets. It seems like about 20 yuan RMB. You didn't see it.

The area of the prospecting platform is not large. There are many scenic spots here. Many sceneries are quite interesting. It is good to enjoy the natural scenery here. The sightseeing bus stops specially to let tourists enjoy the scenery and take photos.
It's not bad to see the scenery. You can also visit the cellar. You can also visit the cellar.

Duro Prospecting Station is a very good scenic spot. Many of the prospecting stations here are large-scale landscapes. You can buy a set of tickets from the cable car up and down, pay attention to wearing clothes, and the cable car leaks.
The scenic spots here are very rich. There are 500 seats, as well as VIP rooms, condition rooms, parking lots and other ancillary facilities are also very complete.

Looking forward to the scale of the platform is still quite large, the location here is very unique, just at the junction of Korea and North Korea, the whole area is composed of plains, here you can see a large area of green areas.
Generally, it is a viewing platform, which can be neglected.
